revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WR849N |revision=(BR) v4.0 |asin= |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=Brasilian only? |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |pcb_id=2050500859 |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7628NN |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD25Q64CSIG |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M14D5121632A-2.5B |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7628NN |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=LEDE Project |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=TP-LINK_XXXX |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=C0:25:E9 |oui_eth=C0:25:E9 }} {{TagLine|300Mbps Wireless N Router}} :''(Brasilian exclusiv model)'' :[http://www.tp-link.com/br/products/details/cat-9_TL-WR849N.html Product page] {{â€¢}} [http://www.tp-link.com/br/download/TL-WR849N_V4.html Support page]
"TL-WR849N(BR) Ver:4.0" is silkscreened on the sticker. :"2050500859" is silkscreened on the board.
===Registration=== *[https://fccid.io/ANATEL/00356-17-03177 ANATEL] Symbol and Number: :00356-17-03177 on outside sticker | photos *EC symbol on outside sticker *ROHS symbol on outside sticker *No FCC symbol or registration number inside or outside
===Specification=== :- SoC: [[MediaTek]] MT7628NN (580MHz) :- RAM: 64 MiB (ESMT M14D5121632A-2.5B) :- Flash: 8 MiB (GigaDevice GD25Q64CSIG) :- LAN: 4x 100M, WAN: 1x 100M :- Only five indicator LEDs: ::Power, Wi-Fi, LAN (one led for all ports), WAN, Lock (WPS) :- No separate hidden ''RESET'' button ::(only one normal joint WPS/RESET button) :- No Power On/Off switch
From specs could be compatible to TL-WR840 v4 {{see also|TP-LINK TL-WR840N v4|TP-LINK TL-WR841HP}}
===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=70687 ''OpenWrt on TL-WR841N v13 or TL-WR840N v4'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] :<small>'''Note''': TL-WR840N v4 have 5 leds: power, wifi, lan (one led for all ports), wan, lock (wps) :::TL-WR841N v13 have 8 leds: power, wifi, lan4, lan3, lan2, lan1, wan, lock (wps)</small> :[https://github.com/lede-project/source/pull/974/commits/8706b608f4848940275cdb523e6bb85705769728 ''ramips: add initial support for TP-LINK TL-WR840N v4'']
===Alternate Firmware Support=== *LEDE Project (OpenWrt) - [https://lede-project.org/toh/hwdata/tp-link/tp-link_tl-wr849n_v4.0_br TP-Link TL-WR849N v4.0 (BR)] *DD-WRT - not yet for the specific model, may be compatible to others
===Other versions=== *[[TP-LINK TL-WR849N(BR) v4.0]] *[[TP-LINK TL-WR849N(BR) v5.0]] *[[TP-LINK TL-WR849N(BR) v6.0]] *[[TP-LINK TL-WR849N(BR) v6.20]]
